products.title: Unilux PVC Blackout Black 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Unilux pvc blackout black 89mm vertical blind in black. Made to measure from 13.33 with free uk mainland delivery. This 89mm vertical blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A durable, moisture resistant and long lasting collection that is available in a range of stunning shades.This black vertical blind is very durable and the perfect choice for your bathroom as it is moisture resistant.
 
 Product id: sdb-vtb0597 fabric colour: black material: fiberglass core laminated with pvc layered coating lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable   slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.metadescription: Unilux black vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.
products.productdescription: A durable soft pvc fabric which can be wiped clean. Ideal for kitchens and bathrooms. Available in other colours.

products.title: Unilux Black (Moisture Resistant)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure unilux black (moisture resistant) bathroom vertical blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality bathroom vertical blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm
 	min drop: 500mm max drop: 3500mm
 	fabric composition: pvc
 	louvre width: 89mm
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	fittings: included
 	controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: a choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
